content.en: Age estimation: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to estimate age based on facial images. These algorithms, such as the AGES algorithm, have been shown to outperform other methods and even human observers in accurately estimating age. By using techniques like manifold learning, robust regression, and deep learning, these algorithms are able to improve age estimation accuracy and handle variations in intrinsic and extrinsic factors. The integration of different features and the optimization of neural network structures have also been found to enhance age estimation from facial images. Overall, these studies demonstrate the potential of machine learning techniques in improving age estimation and recognition.
content.da: Aldersestimering: Forskere har udforsket brugen af algoritmer til at estimere alder baseret på ansigtsbilleder. Disse algoritmer, såsom AGES-algoritmen, har vist sig at overgå andre metoder og endda menneskelige observatører i præcis aldersestimering. Ved at bruge teknikker som manifold learning, robust regression og deep learning er disse algoritmer i stand til at forbedre nøjagtigheden af aldersestimering og håndtere variationer i både indre og ydre faktorer. Integration af forskellige funktioner og optimering af neurale netværksstrukturer har også vist sig at forbedre aldersestimering fra ansigtsbilleder. Samlet set viser disse studier potentialet i maskinlæringsteknikker til at forbedre aldersestimering og genkendelse.
